page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Midland Ross,formerly Cambion,has been in Castleton 24 years.It came because cheaper accomodation was available from a relation.It uses brass ,steel , gold,silver brought by air from U.S.A. then by lorry.It employs 200 people at present (June 1985)and only 6 come from Castleton.The rest are brought in by 6 vans and by buses.The working hours are 7.55am to 4.15pm,a 39 hour week.The company has 2 international branches and agents in every Europeon country.One branch is in Germany,the other in France.The head Office is in Cleveland,Ohio,U.S.A. It makes connectors and its speciality is making cage jacks.Some of its finished products were made concorde aircraft and some for U.S.A. space programme. Since 1980 its buisness has increased 300%
